attributes.action: help the genuine ill and mental depressed people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like to see a higher rate for those on IB who are genuine claimants. 
The government now want to change the rules so that claimants are assessed on if they can use a keyboard/mouse! Lots can do that but they are not skilled in using software such as Excel or other software. To get 'real' work needs a lot of skills that sick claimants don't have and the government should understand that! They have themseles created a lot of high tech, non-descript jobs.
